# RachaAI - Analytics Dashboard Design
## Brazilian Spending Patterns & AI Insights Visualization

*Generated by Sally - UX Expert & Analytics Specialist*
*Created: December 2024*

---

## Analytics Dashboard Overview

This document contains comprehensive analytics dashboard designs for RachaAI, focusing on Brazilian spending patterns, AI insights, user experience metrics, and cultural pattern analysis.

---

## 1. Main Analytics Dashboard

### 1.1 Executive Overview Dashboard

**Screen:** `ExecutiveOverviewDashboard`

```typescript
interface ExecutiveOverviewDashboard {
  // Header section
  header: {
    title: "RachaAI Analytics";
    subtitle: "Vis√£o Geral - Padr√µes Brasileiros";
    dateRange: {
      start: "2024-01-01";
      end: "2024-12-15";
      selector: "dropdown";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Per√≠odo: 1 de janeiro a 15 de dezembro de 2024";
      };
    };
    refreshButton: {
      icon: "refresh";
      lastUpdate: "√öltima atualiza√ß√£o: 2 min atr√°s";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Atualizar dados. √öltima atualiza√ß√£o h√° 2 minutos";
      };
    };
  };
  
  // Key metrics cards
  keyMetrics: {

      };
    };

      value: "94.2%";

      color: "#8B5CF6";

        }
      ];
      accessibility: {

      };
    };
  };
  
  // Cultural pattern analysis
  culturalPatternAnalysis: {
    title: "Padr√µes Culturais Detectados";
    chart: {
      type: "pie-chart";
      data: [
        {

      };
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Gr√°fico de performance dos modelos AI. Haiku mais r√°pido, Opus mais preciso";
      };
    };
  };
}
```

### 1.2 User Experience Analytics Dashboard

**Screen:** `UserExperienceDashboard`

```typescript
interface UserExperienceDashboard {
  // User journey metrics
  userJourneyMetrics: {
    title: "M√©tricas da Jornada do Usu√°rio";
    
    // Conversion funnel
    conversionFunnel: {
      title: "Funil de Convers√£o";
      stages: [
        {
          stage: "Visitantes";
          count: 25000;
          conversion: 100;
          color: "#2563EB";
        },
        {
          stage: "Registros";
          count: 15000;
          conversion: 60;
          color: "#10B981";
        },
        {
          stage: "Primeira Despesa";
          count: 12000;
          conversion: 48;
          color: "#F59E0B";
        },
        {
          stage: "Usu√°rios Ativos";
          count: 8500;
          conversion: 34;
          color: "#8B5CF6";
        },
        {
          stage: "Usu√°rios Premium";
          count: 1200;
          conversion: 4.8;
          color: "#EF4444";
        }
      ];

      };
    };

        },

            color: "#6B7280";
          }
        ];
        accessibility: {

        };
      };
    };
    
    // Accessibility performance
    accessibilityPerformance: {
      title: "Performance de Acessibilidade";

      };

    // Language variation analysis
    languageVariationAnalysis: {
      title: "An√°lise de Varia√ß√µes Lingu√≠sticas";
      variations: [
        {
          pattern: "Rod√≠zio";
          variations: [
            { text: "rod√≠zio japon√™s", region: "SP", frequency: 45 };
            { text: "rod√≠zio", region: "RJ", frequency: 38 };
            { text: "rod√≠zio de sushi", region: "NE", frequency: 12 };
            { text: "rod√≠zio", region: "Sul", frequency: 5 };
          ];
        },
        {
          pattern: "Happy Hour";
          variations: [
            { text: "happy hour", region: "SP", frequency: 52 };
            { text: "beer o'clock", region: "RJ", frequency: 28 };
            { text: "hora do chopp", region: "NE", frequency: 15 };
            { text: "happy hour", region: "Sul", frequency: 5 };
          ];
        }
      ];
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "An√°lise de varia√ß√µes lingu√≠sticas. Rod√≠zio japon√™s mais comum em SP";
      };
    };
  };
}
```

## 2. AI Insights Dashboard

### 2.1 AI Performance Analytics

**Screen:** `AIPerformanceDashboard`

```typescript
interface AIPerformanceDashboard {
  // AI model distribution
  aiModelDistribution: {
    title: "Distribui√ß√£o de Modelos AI";
    chart: {
      type: "stacked-bar-chart";
      data: {
        haiku: {
          usage: 70;
          cost: 1400;
          accuracy: 92.8;
          responseTime: 650;
        };
        sonnet: {
          usage: 25;
          cost: 2500;
          accuracy: 96.5;
          responseTime: 1900;
        };
        opus: {
          usage: 5;
          cost: 750;
          accuracy: 98.7;
          responseTime: 4000;
        };
      };
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Distribui√ß√£o de modelos AI. Haiku: 70% uso, 92,8% precis√£o";
      };
    };
  };
  
  // Cost optimization analytics
  costOptimizationAnalytics: {
    title: "Analytics de Otimiza√ß√£o de Custo";
    
    // Cost trends
    costTrends: {
      title: "Tend√™ncias de Custo";
      chart: {
        type: "line-chart";
        data: {
          daily: [120, 135, 128, 142, 138, 145, 150];
          weekly: [850, 920, 880, 950, 920, 980, 1020];
          monthly: [3200, 3400, 3300, 3600, 3500, 3700, 3800];
        };
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Tend√™ncias de custo. Custo di√°rio m√©dio: R$ 140";
        };
      };
    };
    
    // Cost by region
    costByRegion: {
      title: "Custo por Regi√£o";
      chart: {
        type: "bar-chart";
        data: [
          {
            region: "S√£o Paulo";
            cost: 1800;
            efficiency: 0.85;
            color: "#2563EB";
          },
          {
            region: "Rio de Janeiro";
            cost: 1200;
            efficiency: 0.78;
            color: "#10B981";
          },
          {
            region: "Nordeste";
            cost: 800;
            efficiency: 0.72;
            color: "#F59E0B";
          },
          {
            region: "Sul";
            cost: 400;
            efficiency: 0.88;
            color: "#8B5CF6";
          }
        ];
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Custo por regi√£o. S√£o Paulo: R$ 1.800, efici√™ncia 85%";
        };
      };
    };
  };
  
  // Cultural pattern accuracy
  culturalPatternAccuracy: {
    title: "Precis√£o de Padr√µes Culturais";
    chart: {
      type: "radar-chart";
      data: {
        rodizio: {
          accuracy: 96.2;
          confidence: 0.94;
          regionalVariation: 0.12;
        };
        happyHour: {
          accuracy: 93.8;
          confidence: 0.91;
          regionalVariation: 0.18;
        };
        aniversario: {
          accuracy: 95.1;
          confidence: 0.93;
          regionalVariation: 0.08;
        };
        churrasco: {
          accuracy: 97.3;
          confidence: 0.96;
          regionalVariation: 0.15;
        };
        vaquinha: {
          accuracy: 91.5;
          confidence: 0.89;
          regionalVariation: 0.22;
        };
      };
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Precis√£o de padr√µes culturais. Rod√≠zio: 96,2% precis√£o";
      };
    };
  };
}
```

### 2.2 Predictive Analytics Dashboard

**Screen:** `PredictiveAnalyticsDashboard`

```typescript
interface PredictiveAnalyticsDashboard {
  // Spending pattern predictions
  spendingPatternPredictions: {
    title: "Previs√µes de Padr√µes de Gastos";
    
    // Seasonal predictions
    seasonalPredictions: {
      title: "Previs√µes Sazonais";
      chart: {
        type: "line-chart";
        data: {
          rodizio: {
            jan: 1200, feb: 1100, mar: 1300, apr: 1400,
            may: 1500, jun: 1600, jul: 1700, aug: 1800,
            sep: 1900, oct: 2000, nov: 2100, dec: 2200
          };
          happyHour: {
            jan: 800, feb: 750, mar: 850, apr: 900,
            may: 950, jun: 1000, jul: 1050, aug: 1100,
            sep: 1150, oct: 1200, nov: 1250, dec: 1300
          };
          aniversario: {
            jan: 600, feb: 550, mar: 650, apr: 700,
            may: 750, jun: 800, jul: 850, aug: 900,
            sep: 950, oct: 1000, nov: 1050, dec: 1100
          };
        };
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Previs√µes sazonais. Rod√≠zio cresce no final do ano";
        };
      };
    };
    
    // Regional predictions
    regionalPredictions: {
      title: "Previs√µes Regionais";
      chart: {
        type: "area-chart";
        data: {
          SP: {
            growth: 15.2;
            newUsers: 2500;
            revenue: 450000;
          };
          RJ: {
            growth: 12.8;
            newUsers: 1800;
            revenue: 280000;
          };
          NE: {
            growth: 18.5;
            newUsers: 1200;
            revenue: 180000;
          };
          Sul: {
            growth: 9.7;
            newUsers: 800;
            revenue: 120000;
          };
        };
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Previs√µes regionais. Nordeste: maior crescimento com 18,5%";
        };
      };
    };
  };
  
  // User behavior predictions
  userBehaviorPredictions: {
    title: "Previs√µes de Comportamento do Usu√°rio";
    
    // Churn prediction
    churnPrediction: {
      title: "Previs√£o de Churn";
      chart: {
        type: "gauge-chart";
        data: {
          lowRisk: 65;
          mediumRisk: 25;
          highRisk: 10;
        };
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Previs√£o de churn. 65% baixo risco, 10% alto risco";
        };
      };
    };
    
    // Feature adoption prediction
    featureAdoptionPrediction: {
      title: "Previs√£o de Ado√ß√£o de Recursos";
      features: [
        {
          feature: "PIX Integration";
          currentAdoption: 78;
          predictedAdoption: 92;
          timeline: "3 months";
        },
        {
          feature: "Voice Input";
          currentAdoption: 45;
          predictedAdoption: 68;
          timeline: "6 months";
        },
        {
          feature: "Camera Scanning";
          currentAdoption: 32;
          predictedAdoption: 55;
          timeline: "4 months";
        },
        {
          feature: "Premium Features";
          currentAdoption: 12;
          predictedAdoption: 28;
          timeline: "12 months";
        }
      ];
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Previs√£o de ado√ß√£o de recursos. PIX: 78% atual, 92% previsto";
      };
    };
  };
  
  // Revenue predictions
  revenuePredictions: {
    title: "Previs√µes de Receita";
    
    // Revenue forecast
    revenueForecast: {
      title: "Previs√£o de Receita";
      chart: {
        type: "line-chart";
        data: {
          actual: [3200, 3400, 3300, 3600, 3500, 3700];
          predicted: [3800, 4000, 4200, 4400, 4600, 4800];
        };
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Previs√£o de receita. Crescimento de 20% projetado";
        };
      };
    };
    
    // Revenue by source
    revenueBySource: {
      title: "Receita por Fonte";
      chart: {
        type: "doughnut-chart";
        data: [
          {
            source: "Premium Subscriptions";
            revenue: 1800000;
            percentage: 45;
            color: "#2563EB";
          },
          {
            source: "B2B Partnerships";
            revenue: 1200000;
            percentage: 30;
            color: "#10B981";
          },
          {

            revenue: 600000;

            percentage: 10;

          }
        ];
        accessibility: {

        };
      };
    };
  };
}
```

## 3. B2B Analytics Dashboard

### 3.1 Restaurant Partnership Analytics

**Screen:** `RestaurantPartnershipDashboard`

```typescript
interface RestaurantPartnershipDashboard {
  // Partnership overview
  partnershipOverview: {
    title: "Vis√£o Geral de Parcerias";
    
    // Partnership metrics
    partnershipMetrics: {
      totalPartners: {
        value: 156;
        change: "+23";
        trend: "up";
        icon: "üè™";
        color: "#2563EB";
      };
      activePartners: {
        value: 142;
        change: "+18";
        trend: "up";
        icon: "‚úÖ";
        color: "#10B981";
      };
      totalRevenue: {
        value: "R$ 1.2M";
        change: "+34%";
        trend: "up";
        icon: "üí∞";
        color: "#F59E0B";
      };
      averageOrder: {
        value: "R$ 187";
        change: "+12%";
        trend: "up";
        icon: "üìä";
        color: "#8B5CF6";
      };
    };

    partnerPerformance: {
      title: "Performance dos Parceiros";
      chart: {
        type: "bar-chart";
        data: [
          {
            partner: "Restaurante Japon√™s SP";

          },

          }
        ];

      };
    };
  };
  
  // Restaurant analytics
  restaurantAnalytics: {
    title: "Analytics de Restaurantes";
    
    // Order patterns
    orderPatterns: {
      title: "Padr√µes de Pedidos";
      chart: {
        type: "heatmap";

          days: ["Seg", "Ter", "Qua", "Qui", "Sex", "S√°b", "Dom"];

            [15, 25, 30, 45, 60, 75, 80], // Seg
            [20, 30, 35, 50, 65, 80, 85], // Ter
            [25, 35, 40, 55, 70, 85, 90], // Qua
            [30, 40, 45, 60, 75, 90, 95], // Qui
            [35, 45, 50, 65, 80, 95, 100], // Sex
            [40, 50, 55, 70, 85, 100, 105], // S√°b
            [45, 55, 60, 75, 90, 105, 110]  // Dom
          ];
        };
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Padr√µes de pedidos. Picos aos s√°bados e domingos";
        };
      };
    };
    
    // Cuisine type analytics
    cuisineTypeAnalytics: {
      title: "Analytics por Tipo de Cozinha";
      chart: {
        type: "pie-chart";
        data: [
          {
            cuisine: "Japonesa";
            orders: 4500;
            revenue: 810000;
            percentage: 35;
            color: "#EF4444";
          },
          {
            cuisine: "Brasileira";
            orders: 3200;
            revenue: 480000;
            percentage: 25;
            color: "#F59E0B";
          },
          {
            cuisine: "Italiana";
            orders: 2800;
            revenue: 420000;
            percentage: 22;
            color: "#10B981";
          },
          {
            cuisine: "Churrascaria";
            orders: 1800;
            revenue: 270000;
            percentage: 14;
            color: "#8B5CF6";
          },
          {
            cuisine: "Outros";

  };
  
  // Partnership insights
  partnershipInsights: {
```

---

## 4. Success Criteria

### **Analytics Dashboard Success Metrics:**
- **Data Accuracy:** 99%+ accuracy in all metrics
- **Real-time Updates:** <30s delay for live data
- **User Adoption:** 80%+ of managers use dashboards weekly
- **Insight Generation:** 50+ actionable insights per month
- **Performance:** <2s load time for all dashboards

### **Analytics Requirements:**
- **Brazilian market focus** in all metrics and insights
- **Cultural pattern recognition** and analysis
- **Regional performance** tracking and optimization
- **AI model performance** monitoring and optimization
- **Accessibility analytics** for inclusive design
- **Predictive capabilities** for business growth

The analytics dashboard designs ensure RachaAI provides **comprehensive business intelligence** with **Brazilian cultural insights**, **AI performance optimization**, and **actionable recommendations** for growth and user experience improvement.
